subject: Cheating
Colleges and Universities
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The University of Memphis said it should keep victories from the 2007-8 season that ended with a loss in the men’s national title game after an internal investigation turned up no proof that a former player cheated on his College Boards.
snippet: The University of Memphis said it should keep victories from the 2007-8 season that ended with a loss in the men’s national title game after an internal investigation turned up no proof that a former player cheated on his College Boards.
